"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a591e56368724bc6000879#post_55a591e56368724bc6000879
I've heard a good start is to post on as many sites as you can. Deviant art, Facebook, Tumblr, etc. Get your name out there.

One person got a chance to do comics from avengers fan art (this is a very rare occurrence mind you)
